title: Monday's highlights on TV
text: Monday, October 5, 2015, 12:01 a.m. Mondays highlights on TV include:The pressure on team Scorpion just refuses to ease. Tonight, Sylvester (Ari Stidham) goes undercover in a federal prison, hoping to save the lives of three federal judges and, of course, he eventually needs help to break out. 9 p.m., CBS Penn & Teller: Fool Us: Poof! Season 2 vanishes. 8 p.m., CW Ill Have What Phils Having: Everybody Loves Raymond creator and notorious Hollywood foodie Phil Rosenthal eats barbarian style in Italy. 10 p.m., PBS From Herald news services
